mapper.sql: id, code, name, parent_id, first_letter, level
mapper.select:
select
from address_region
AND ( name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR first_letter LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') )
mapper.insert:
insert into address_region
id,
code,
name,
parent_id,
first_letter,
level,

mapper.update:
update address_region
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
first_letter = #{firstLetter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update address_region set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, first_letter = #{firstLetter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
